title: How to Make a Tequila Sunrise

steps.headline: Place a few ice cubes in your glass.
Pour the tequila onto the ice.
Pour the orange juice into the glass.
Pour the grenadine into the glass.
Cut a slice from a whole orange.
steps.description: Take the slice and cut that in half. Make a wedge (small cut in the middle) and use the wedge on the side of your glass.

steps.headline: Take the cherry and make a small indent on the bottom of it as well.
steps.description: Use the cut on the side of the glass.

steps.headline: Place a stirrer or umbrella and serve.

text: Place a few ice cubes in your glass.  Pour the tequila onto the ice.  Pour the orange juice into the glass.  Pour the grenadine into the glass.  Cut a slice from a whole orange. Take the slice and cut that in half. Make a wedge (small cut in the middle) and use the wedge on the side of your glass. Take the cherry and make a small indent on the bottom of it as well. Use the cut on the side of the glass. Place a stirrer or umbrella and serve.
sentences: Place a few ice cubes in your glass.
Pour the tequila onto the ice.
Pour the orange juice into the glass.
Pour the grenadine into the glass.
Cut a slice from a whole orange.
Take the slice and cut that in half.
Make a wedge (small cut in the middle) and use the wedge on the side of your glass.
Take the cherry and make a small indent on the bottom of it as well.
Use the cut on the side of the glass.
Place a stirrer or umbrella and serve.
